Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using LRRK2 mutant cells.

Readout description.Result Description: The I2020T mutant LRRK2 showed reduced protein levels compared to wild-type, indicating increased susceptibility to degradation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: A non-expressing cell line was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type levels.
